minvariance 0.0.0.9002

Test longitudinal measurement invariance

long_minvariance.Rd

Test longitudinal measurement invariance

long_minvariance(
  data,
  n_timepoints,
  n_items,
  add = NULL,
  remove = NULL,
  measure_name = "x",
  time_str = "_t",
  item_str = "_i",
  details = FALSE,
  return = c("fit_statistics", "model_tests", "lavaan_objects", "lavaan_syntax")
)

Arguments

data

Data in wide format (one row for each participant, one column for each item at each time point)
n_timepoints

Number of time points
n_items

Number of items
add

lavaan syntax to add to the model
remove

List, remove specific parts of the automatically generated model
measure_name

String, name of the measure
time_str

String, prefix of the point specifier
item_str

String, prefix of the item specifier
details

Return details of selected output selected in return argument
return

What should be returned ("fit_statistics", "model_tests", "lavaan_objects", "lavaan_syntax")

Value
